bug.short_desc: Evolution crashes on writing or replying a mail
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Evolution crashes when trying to write or reply a mail with following errors: $ evolution
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: Failed to register client: GDBus.Error:org.gnome.SessionManager.AlreadyRegistered: Unable to register client
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: Failed to get an inhibit portal proxy: The name org.freedesktop.portal.Desktop is not owned Rspam Plugin enabled (evolution 3.22, evolution-rspam 0.6.0)
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: gtk_widget_size_allocate(): attempt to underallocate EShellTaskbar's child GtkBox 0x564e820325d0. Allocation is 1305x34, but minimum required size is 81x36.
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: gtk_widget_size_allocate(): attempt to underallocate GtkBox's child EActivityProxy 0x564e82019930. Allocation is 1305x34, but minimum required size is 81x36.
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: gtk_widget_size_allocate(): attempt to underallocate EActivityProxy's child GtkBox 0x564e82930db0. Allocation is 1303x32, but minimum required size is 79x34.
(evolution:3874): Gtk-WARNING **: gtk_widget_size_allocate(): attempt to underallocate GtkBox's child GtkButton 0x564e8284cdc0. Allocation is 34x32, but minimum required size is 34x34.
** (evolution:3874): CRITICAL **: void webkit_uri_scheme_request_finish(WebKitURISchemeRequest*, GInputStream*, gint64, const gchar*): assertion 'G_IS_INPUT_STREAM(inputStream)' failed
** (evolution:3874): CRITICAL **: void webkit_uri_scheme_request_finish(WebKitURISchemeRequest*, GInputStream*, gint64, const gchar*): assertion 'G_IS_INPUT_STREAM(inputStream)' failed /usr/libexec/webkit2gtk-4.0/WebKitWebProcess: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/evolution/web-extensions/webkit-editor/libewebkiteditorwebextension.so: undefined symbol: webkit_dom_html_element_insert_adjacent_html
(evolution:3874): webkit-editor-WARNING **: WebKitWebProcess (page id 2) for EWebKitEditor crashed Segmentation fault (Speicherabzug geschrieben)
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): $ rpm -q evolution evolution-3.21.91-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: allways
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open evolution 2. Try to write a new mail 3.
Actual results: Evolution crashes
Expected results:
Additional info:

PackageKit-1.1.4-0.3.20160901.fc25 adwaita-icon-theme-3.21.91-1.fc25 at-spi2-atk-2.21.91-1.fc25 atomix-3.21.91-1.fc25 clutter-gtk-1.8.0-2.fc25 cogl-1.22.2-1.fc25 devhelp-3.21.91-1.fc25 evolution-3.21.91-2.fc25 evolution-data-server-3.21.91-1.fc25 evolution-ews-3.21.91-1.fc25 evolution-mapi-3.21.91-1.fc25 five-or-more-3.21.91-1.fc25 fwupd-0.7.3-2.fc25 gdk-pixbuf2-2.35.4-1.fc25 gdm-3.21.91-2.fc25 geary-0.11.2-1.fc25 gitg-3.21.91-1.fc25 glib2-2.49.6-1.fc25 gnome-2048-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-autoar-0.1.1-1.fc25 gnome-backgrounds-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-calendar-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-clocks-3.21.2-1.fc25 gnome-color-manager-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-disk-utility-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-documents-3.21.90-1.fc25 gnome-initial-setup-3.21.91-2.fc25 gnome-klotski-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-maps-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-mines-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-multi-writer-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-nibbles-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-online-accounts-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-packagekit-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-photos-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-power-manager-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-robots-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-settings-daemon-3.21.90-1.fc25 gnome-shell-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-shell-extension-background-logo-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-shell-extensions-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-software-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-system-monitor-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-taquin-3.21.91-1.fc25 gnome-user-share-3.18.2-1.fc25 gtk3-3.21.5-1.fc25 gvfs-1.29.91-1.fc25 iagno-3.21.91-1.fc25 libappstream-glib-0.6.2-1.fc25 libgepub-0.4-1.fc25 libgnome-games-support-1.1.91-1.fc25 libgweather-3.20.3-1.fc25 lightsoff-3.21.91-1.fc25 mutter-3.21.91-1.fc25 nautilus-3.21.91.1-1.fc25 orca-3.21.91-1.fc25 pango-1.40.2-1.fc25 polari-3.21.91-1.fc25 pygobject3-3.21.91-1.fc25 rygel-0.31.5-1.fc25 simple-scan-3.21.90-1.fc25 sushi-3.21.91-1.fc25 swell-foop-3.21.91-1.fc25 sysprof-3.21.91-1.fc25 totem-3.21.91-1.fc25 webkitgtk4-2.13.90-1.fc25 xdg-desktop-portal-0.3-1.fc25 xdg-desktop-portal-gtk-0.3-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-c565698917

This problem still exists in evolution-3.22.2-1.fc25.x86_64
GLib:ERROR:gvarianttypeinfo.c:184:g_variant_type_info_check: assertion failed: (0 <= index && index < 24)
(evolution:9104): webkit-editor-WARNING **: WebKitWebProcess (page id 2) for EWebKitEditor crashed
(evolution:9104): evolution-util-WARNING **: Failed to call a DBus Proxy method org.gnome.Evolution.WebExtension.EWebKitEditor.WC0x559b41fba670::DOMRemoveEmbeddedStyleSheet: Message recipient disconnected from message bus without replying
(evolution:9104): webkit-editor-WARNING **: EHTMLEditorWebExtension not ready at webkit_editor_set_element_attribute!
(evolution:9104): webkit-editor-WARNING **: EHTMLEditorWebExtension not ready at webkit_editor_set_element_attribute!
(evolution:9104): webkit-editor-WARNING **: EHTMLEditorWebExtension not ready at webkit_editor_set_element_attribute!

Thanks for the update. I'm not sure, but I think this is related to one of these commits:
https://git.gnome.org/browse/evolution/commit/?id=841c3421db481b https://git.gnome.org/browse/evolution/commit/?id=9cef72782a0d62
which are part of the evolution 3.22.3 (currently in updates-testing). Tomas would know better.
If you'd have any more concrete steps, because I can create new mails, I do it almost daily, then it'll be helpful. Of course, trying with 3.22.3 would be even better.
Thanks, I have installed the 3.22.2 version from updates-testing and it seems to be working. I will report back if it fails.

(In reply to JokeDude from comment #10) > Thanks, I have installed the 3.22.2 version from updates-testing and it > seems to be working. I will report back if it fails.
Okay, thanks. I suppose you meant 3.22.3.
